entry.title: Current Conditions: -1.6°C

entry.title: Sunday: Mainly sunny. High 7 except plus 1 in onshore winds.
entry.summary: Clearing this afternoon. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40. High 7 except plus 1 in onshore winds. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM ADT Sunday 12 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy this evening. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming north 20 this evening. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM ADT Sunday 12 March 2023
